lemma valid_Entry_path_cases: assumes "(_Entry_) -as\<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<surd>* n" and "as \<noteq> []" shows "(\<exists>a' as'. as = as'@[a'] \<and> intra_kind(kind a')) \<or> (\<exists>a' as' Q r p fs. as = as'@[a'] \<and> kind a' = Q:r\<hookrightarrow>\<^bsub>p\<^esub>fs) \<or> (\<exists>as' as'' n'. as = as'@as'' \<and> as'' \<noteq> [] \<and> n' -as''\<rightarrow>\<^bsub>sl\<^esub>* n)"
